mean_cn: adj. 目中无人的，高傲的
mean_en: having or showing the proud and unpleasant attitude of people who think that they are better or more important than other people
word_etyma: super在···上 + cili眼睑 + ous形容词后缀 → 把眼睛翻到眼睑上面去 → supercilious 目空一切的
sentence: He has a supercilious contempt for those he regards as beneath him.
sentence_trans: 对那些他认为更弱的人，他带着目中无人的鄙视。
